{"id":1274707928,"question_id":3430,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1717296538,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1274707928/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Days Without Meetings","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countDays(int days, int[][] meetings) {\n        \n        Arrays.sort(meetings, (a,b)->a[1]!=b[1] ? a[1]-b[1] : a[0]-b[0]);\n        \n        int len =meetings.length;\n        int[] prev = meetings[0];\n        \n        int cnt = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            int[] curr = meetings[i];\n            \n            if(prev[1]<curr[0]){\n                \n                cnt += prev[1]-prev[0]+1;\n                prev = curr;\n                \n            }else{\n                prev[0] = Math.min(prev[0], curr[0]);\n                prev[1] = Math.max(prev[1], curr[1]);\n            }\n            \n            // 1 3, 2 4\n        }\n        // 3 4, 2 5, 3 8, 4 8\n        // 3 8 \n        cnt += prev[1]-prev[0]+1;\n        \n        return days-cnt;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-days-without-meetings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
